CustomField.description: Formula field to migrate the Courthouse information from the Meeting to the ODA object.
CustomField.formula: Meeting__r.Courthouse__r.Name & BR() & Meeting__r.Courthouse__r.Address_1__c & " " & Meeting__r.Courthouse__r.Address_2__c & BR() & Meeting__r.Courthouse__r.City__c & ", " & Meeting__r.Courthouse__r.State__c & " " & Meeting__r.Courthouse__r.Zip_Code__c
CustomField.label: Courthouse Output
